about_the_game: Travel to Grand Chien with the soundtrack for Jagged Alliance 3, composed by George Strezov. These 62 tracks combine the power of the symphony orchestra with ethnic instruments and voices thus creating a unique style that musically represents Jagged Alliance 3.
detailed_description: Travel to Grand Chien with the soundtrack for Jagged Alliance 3, composed by George Strezov. These 62 tracks combine the power of the symphony orchestra with ethnic instruments and voices thus creating a unique style that musically represents Jagged Alliance 3.

name: Jagged Alliance 3 Soundtrack

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 3570 MB available space
